title: The Seed
description: The King is getting old - and he has no children. How will he decide who to choose as the next King or Queen? Listen to this fun, English retelling of a traditional Chinese story told by storyteller Amy Douglas and find out.
itunes:title: The Seed
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
